pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualization of Multiple Genome-Wide Association Study Summary Statistics // A 'grammar of graphics' approach for visualizing summary statistics from multiple Genome-wide Association Studies (GWAS). It offers geneticists, bioinformaticians, and researchers a powerful yet flexible tool for illustrating complex genetic associations using data from various GWAS datasets. The visualizations can be extensively customized, facilitating detailed comparative analysis across different genetic studies. Reference: Uffelmann, E. et al. (2021) doi:10.1038/s43586-021-00056-9.
